alert.note: Alert for Slope (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 11 at 8:10PM CDT until July 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR BOWMAN...SOUTHEASTERN SLOPE AND WESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 709 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Bowman, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bowman, Hettinger, Scranton, Rhame, Reeder, Mud Buttes, Griffin, Bucyrus, Gascoyne, Sunset Butte, Bowman Haley Dam and Buffalo Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
